PHRASE.LANG: A cry of pain as it enters the world. A chorus of screams as it leaves.
Un cri de douleur quand il arrive dans ce monde. Une cacophonie de hurlements quand il le quitte.
Ein Schrei der Schmerzen, als er auf diese Welt kommt. Ein Chor der Schreie, als er sie verlässt.
Un grido di dolore quando viene al mondo. Un coro di urla quando se ne va.
Un grito de dolor cuando entra en este mundo. Un coro de gritos cuando se va.
JP A cry of pain as it enters the world. A chorus of screams as it leaves.
KR A cry of pain as it enters the world. A chorus of screams as it leaves.
SG A cry of pain as it enters the world. A chorus of screams as it leaves.
HK A cry of pain as it enters the world. A chorus of screams as it leaves.
TW A cry of pain as it enters the world. A chorus of screams as it leaves.
A cry of pain as it enters the world. A chorus of screams as it leaves.
About the Sphinx, I have mixed feelings. Their wisdom I crave, but their secrecy I can’t tolerate.\n—Szadek
« Je suis toujours partagé en ce qui concerne les sphinx. J'ai besoin de leur sagesse, mais je ne peux tolérer leur passion du secret. »\n—Szadek
Ich bin mir meiner Meinung über die Sphinx nicht sicher. Ich neide ihr ihre Weisheit, aber ich kann ihre Geheimnistuerei nicht dulden.\n—Szadek
Riguardo alla Sfinge, ho sentimenti contrastanti. Bramo la loro saggezza, ma non posso tollerare la loro segretezza.\n—Szadek
Tengo sentimientos encontrados sobre la esfinge. Ansío su sabiduría, pero no puedo tolerar su secretismo.\n—Szadek
JP About the Sphinx, I have mixed feelings. Their wisdom I crave, but their secrecy I can't tolerate. Szadek
KR About the Sphinx, I have mixed feelings. Their wisdom I crave, but their secrecy I can't tolerate. Szadek
SG About the Sphinx, I have mixed feelings. Their wisdom I crave, but their secrecy I can't tolerate. Szadek
HK About the Sphinx, I have mixed feelings. Their wisdom I crave, but their secrecy I can't tolerate. Szadek
TW About the Sphinx, I have mixed feelings. Their wisdom I crave, but their secrecy I can't tolerate. Szadek
About the Sphinx, I have mixed feelings. Their wisdom I crave, but their secrecy I can’t tolerate.\n—Szadek
Gather all the keys to the Knowledge Font by completing the mini-games throughout the Great Halls, and then return here to claim your Final Reward. [#Legal]
Rassemblez toutes les clés permettant d'accéder à la Fontaine du Savoir en jouant les mini-jeux des Grandes salles, puis revenez ici pour recevoir votre récompense finale [#Legal]
Sammle alle Schlüssel zur Quelle des Wissens, indem du die Minispiele in den Großen Hallen löst, und kehre dann hierher zurück, um deine Abschlussbelohnung zu erhalten. [#Legal]
Raccogli tutte le chiavi per la Fonte della Conoscenza completando le mini-partite nelle Grandi Sale e poi torna qui per reclamare la tua Ricompensa Finale. [#Legal]
Reúne todas las llaves de la Fuente del Conocimiento completando los mini-juegos de los Grandes Salones, y luego regresa aquí para reclamar tu Recompensa Final. [#Legal]
JP Access the key portal upon completion of all games. [#Legal]
KR Access the key portal upon completion of all games. [#Legal]
SG Access the key portal upon completion of all games. [#Legal]
HK Access the key portal upon completion of all games. [#Legal]
TW Access the key portal upon completion of all games. [#Legal]
Gather all the keys to the Knowledge Font by completing the mini-games throughout the Great Halls, and then return here to claim your Final Reward. [#Legal]
Black mana corrupts and dominates. Creatures such as demons and the undead are black mana’s specialty. Black mana comes from the swamps.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.

Le mana noir corrompt et domine. Les créatures telles que les démons et les morts-vivants sont la spécialité du mana noir. Le mana noir vient des marais.\nCette exposition est en cours de construction.

Schwarzes Mana korrumpiert und beherrscht. Untote Kreaturen und Dämonen sind ohne schwarzes Mana kaum denkbar. Schwarzes Mana kommt aus den Sümpfen.\nAn dieser Ausstellung wird derzeit noch gearbeitet.
Il mana nero corrompe e comanda. La specialità delle magie nere è l'evocazione di creature come demoni e non morti. Il mana nero proviene dalle paludi.\nQuesta mostra al momento è in costruzione.

El maná negro corrompe y domina. Las criaturas como los demonios y los muertos vivientes son la especialidad del maná negro. El maná negro proviene de los pantanos.\nEsta muestra está actualmente en construcción.
JP Black mana corrupts and dominates. Creatures such as demons and the undead are black mana's speciality. Black mana comes from the swamps.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.
KR Black mana corrupts and dominates. Creatures such as demons and the undead are black mana's speciality. Black mana comes from the swamps.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.

TW Black mana corrupts and dominates. Creatures such as demons and the undead are black mana's speciality. Black mana comes from the swamps.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.
Black mana corrupts and dominates. Creatures such as demons and the undead are black mana’s specialty. Black mana comes from the swamps.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.
Blue mana controls and deceives. This is magic of the mind, the wind, and the waves. Blue mana comes from the islands.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.
Le mana bleu contrôle et trompe. C'est la magie de l'esprit, du vent et des vagues. Le mana bleu coule des îles.\nCette exposition est en cours de construction.
Blaues Mana kontrolliert und betrügt. Dies ist die Magie des Verstandes, des Windes und der Wellen. Blaues Mana kommt aus den Inseln.\nAn dieser Ausstellung wird derzeit noch gearbeitet.
Il mana blu manipola e inganna. Questa è la magia della mente, del vento e delle onde. Il mana blu proviene dalle isole.\nQuesta mostra al momento è in costruzione.
El maná azul controla y engaña. Ésta es magia de la mente, el viento y las olas. El maná azul proviende de las islas.\nEsta muestra está actualmente en construcción.
JP Blue mana controls and deceives. This is magic of the mind, the wind, and the waves. Blue mana comes from the islands.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.
KR Blue mana controls and deceives. This is magic of the mind, the wind, and the waves. Blue mana comes from the islands.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.

Blue mana controls and deceives. This is magic of the mind, the wind, and the waves. Blue mana comes from the islands.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.
Chandra Nalaar is a red-magic-wielding Planeswalker. Her specialty is pyromancy: spells of fire, fire, and more fire.
Chandra Nalaàr est une planeswalker qui utilise la magie rouge. Elle est spécialisée en pyromancie : les sorts de feu, le feu, sans oublier le feu.
Chandra Nalaar ist eine Planeswalkerin, die rotes Mana verwendet. Ihr Spezialgebiet ist die Pyromagie: Zauber mit Feuer, Feuer und noch mehr Feuer.
Chandra Nalaar è una planeswalker che brandisce la magia rossa. La sua specialità è la piromanzia: magie che bruciano, ardono e ustionano.
Chandra Nalaar es una Planeswalker que usa magia roja. Su especialidad es la piromancia: hechizos de fuego, fuego y más fuego.
JP Chandra Nalaar is a red-magic-wielding planeswalker. Her specialty is pyromancy: spells of fire, fire, and more fire.
KR Chandra Nalaar is a red-magic-wielding planeswalker. Her specialty is pyromancy: spells of fire, fire, and more fire.

Chandra Nalaar is a red-magic-wielding Planeswalker. Her specialty is pyromancy: spells of fire, fire, and more fire.

Congratulations! You have unlocked the Font of all Magic: The Gathering knowledge and can claim your reward.
Félicitations ! Vous avez déverrouillé la Fontaine de tout le savoir de Magic: The Gathering et vous pouvez recevoir votre récompense.
Gratulation! Du hast die Quelle alles Wissens über Magic: The Gathering erreicht und kannst dir deine Belohnung abholen.
Congratulazioni! Hai sbloccato la Fonte di tutte le conoscenze di Magic: The Gathering e puoi reclamare la tua ricompensa.
¡Felicitaciones! Haz desbloqueado la Fuente de todo el conocimiento de Magic: The Gathering y puedes reclamar tu recompensa.
JP Congratulations! You Unlocked the Key Portal.
KR Congratulations! You Unlocked the Key Portal.
SG Congratulations! You Unlocked the Key Portal.
HK Congratulations! You Unlocked the Key Portal.
TW Congratulations! You Unlocked the Key Portal.
Congratulations! You have unlocked the Font of all Magic: The Gathering knowledge and can claim your reward.
Dragons erupt from peaks of chaos and flow from rivers of molten rage.
Les dragons surgissent des pics du chaos et naissent des rivières de rage en fusion.
Drachen tauchen aus Gipfeln des Chaos aus und schwimmen auf Flüssen aus geschmolzenem Zorn.
I draghi spuntano da picchi di caos e sgorgano da fiumi di rabbia fusa.
Los dragones brotan de cimas de caos y fluyen de ríos de ira fundida.
JP Dragons erupt from peaks of chaos and flow from rivers of molten rage.
KR Dragons erupt from peaks of chaos and flow from rivers of molten rage.
SG Dragons erupt from peaks of chaos and flow from rivers of molten rage.
HK Dragons erupt from peaks of chaos and flow from rivers of molten rage.
TW Dragons erupt from peaks of chaos and flow from rivers of molten rage.
Dragons erupt from peaks of chaos and flow from rivers of molten rage.

Green mana is about growth and strength. Only the strong survive, and green mages wield the strength of life and ferocity. Green mana comes from the forests.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.

Le mana vert est la magie de la croissance et de la force. Elle est régie par la loi du plus fort, et les magiciens verts manipulent la force et la férocité de la vie. Le mana vert émane des forêts.\nCette exposition est en cours de construction.

Grünes Mana bedeutet Wachstum und Stärke. Nur die Starken überleben, und in grünen Magiern fließt die Stärke von Leben und Wildheit. Grünes Mana kommt aus den Wäldern.\nAn dieser Ausstellung wird derzeit noch gearbeitet.

Il mana verde si specializza nella crescita e nella forza bruta. Solo il più forte sopravvive, e i maghi verdi impugnano la forza della vita e della ferocia. Il mana verde proviene dalle foreste.\nQuesta mostra al momento è in costruzione.

El maná verde se basa en el crecimiento y la fuerza. Sólo el más fuerte sobrevive, y los magos verde esgrimen la fuerza y ferocidad de la vida. El maná verde proviene de los bosques.\nEsta muestra está actualmente en construcción.

JP Green mana is about growth and strength. Only the strong survive, and green mages wield the strength of life and ferocity. Green mana comes from the forests.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.

KR Green mana is about growth and strength. Only the strong survive, and green mages wield the strength of life and ferocity. Green mana comes from the forests.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.

SG Green mana is about growth and strength. Only the strong survive, and green mages wield the strength of life and ferocity. Green mana comes from the forests.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.

Green mana is about growth and strength. Only the strong survive, and green mages wield the strength of life and ferocity. Green mana comes from the forests.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.
Her sword sings more beautifully than any choir.
Le chant de son épée est plus exaltant que celui du plus beau des chœurs.
Ihr Schwert singt schöner als jeder Chor.
La sua spada canta meglio di qualsiasi coro.
Su espada canta más bellamente que cualquier coro.
JP Her sword sings more beautifully than any choir.
KR Her sword sings more beautifully than any choir.
SG Her sword sings more beautifully than any choir.
HK Her sword sings more beautifully than any choir.
TW Her sword sings more beautifully than any choir.
Her sword sings more beautifully than any choir.
It shreds its prey as each head fights for the choicest bits.
Elle déchiquette sa proie car chaque tête désire les morceaux de choix.
Sie zerfetzt ihre Beute, da die Köpfe miteinander um die leckersten Bissen streiten.
Fa a pezzi la sua preda mentre ogni testa lotta per i bocconi più saporiti.
Destroza a su presa mientras cada cabeza elige el mejor pedazo.
JP It shreds its prey as each head fights for the choicest bits.
KR It shreds its prey as each head fights for the choicest bits.
SG It shreds its prey as each head fights for the choicest bits.
HK It shreds its prey as each head fights for the choicest bits.
TW It shreds its prey as each head fights for the choicest bits.
It shreds its prey as each head fights for the choicest bits.
It’s drawn to the scent of screaming.
Il est attiré par l'odeur des hurlements.
Er scheint deine Schreie riechen zu können.
Viene attirato dal profumo delle urla.
Lo atrae el aroma de los gritos.
JP It's drawn to the scent of screaming.
KR It's drawn to the scent of screaming.
SG It's drawn to the scent of screaming.
HK It's drawn to the scent of screaming.
TW It's drawn to the scent of screaming.
It’s drawn to the scent of screaming.
Jace Beleren is a Planeswalker who wields blue magic. His specialty is mental magic: spells of mind-reading, illusion, knowledge, and deception.
Jace Beleren est un planeswalker qui utilise la magie bleue. Il est spécialisé dans la magie mentale : les sorts de télépathie, d'illusion, de connaissance et de tromperie.
Jace Beleren ist ein Planeswalker, der blaue Magie verwendet. Sein Spezialgebiet ist Mentalmagie: Zaubersprüche des Gedankenlesens, der Illusion, des Wissens und der Täuschung.
Jace Beleren è un planeswalker che brandisce la magia blu. La sua specialità è la magia mentale: incantesimi di inganno e illusione, capaci di leggere le menti e scoprire qualsiasi segreto.
Jace Beleren es un Planeswalker que usa magia azul. Su especialidad es la magia mental: hechizos para leer la mente, ilusión, conocimiento y engaño.
JP Jace Beleren is a planeswalker who wields blue magic. His specialty is mental magic: spells of mind-reading, illusion, knowledge, and deception.
KR Jace Beleren is a planeswalker who wields blue magic. His specialty is mental magic: spells of mind-reading, illusion, knowledge, and deception.
SG Jace Beleren is a planeswalker who wields blue magic. His specialty is mental magic: spells of mind-reading, illusion, knowledge, and deception.
HK Jace Beleren is a planeswalker who wields blue magic. His specialty is mental magic: spells of mind-reading, illusion, knowledge, and deception.
TW Jace Beleren is a planeswalker who wields blue magic. His specialty is mental magic: spells of mind-reading, illusion, knowledge, and deception.
Jace Beleren is a Planeswalker who wields blue magic. His specialty is mental magic: spells of mind-reading, illusion, knowledge, and deception.
Look at this creature, so like the conclave it serves. Cut one head and it grows two. Damage it and it flourishes.
Regardez cette créature. Elle ressemble tant au Conclave qu'elle sert. Coupez-lui une tête ; il en repousse deux. Blessez-la et elle fleurit.
Schau dir diese Kreatur an, wie sie dem Konklave dient. Haue einen Kopf ab, und es wachsen zwei neue nach. Verletze sie, und sie wird stärker.
Osserva questa creatura, così simile al conclave che serve. Taglia una testa e ne ricrescono due. Danneggiala e prospera.
Miren esta criatura, tan parecida al Cónclave que sirve. Le cortas una cabeza y le crecen dos. La dañas y crece.
JP Look at this creature, so like the conclave it serves. Cut one head and it grows two. Damage it and it flourishes.
KR Look at this creature, so like the conclave it serves. Cut one head and it grows two. Damage it and it flourishes.
SG Look at this creature, so like the conclave it serves. Cut one head and it grows two. Damage it and it flourishes.
HK Look at this creature, so like the conclave it serves. Cut one head and it grows two. Damage it and it flourishes.
TW Look at this creature, so like the conclave it serves. Cut one head and it grows two. Damage it and it flourishes.
Look at this creature, so like the conclave it serves. Cut one head and it grows two. Damage it and it flourishes.

Obtén el premio de la última camiset
Red mana burns away its foes. Fire and destruction rule this colour of magic. Dragons are its purest embodiment. Red mana comes from the mountains.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.

Le mana rouge consume ses ennemis. Le feu et la destruction dominent cette couleur de magie. Les dragons en sont l'incarnation la plus pure. Le mana rouge provient des montagnes.\nCette exposition est en cours de construction.

Rotes Mana verbrennt seine Gegner. Feuer und Zerstörung sind die Kennzeichen dieser Farbe. Drachen sind die perfekte Verkörperung dessen. Rotes Mana kommt aus den Bergen.\nAn dieser Ausstellung wird derzeit noch gearbeitet.

Il mana rosso incenerisce qualsiasi avversario. Il fuoco e la distruzione dominano le magie di questo colore. I draghi rappresentano la sua incarnazione più pura. Il mana rosso proviene dalle montagne.\nQuesta mostra al momento è in costruzione.

El maná rojo quema a sus oponentes. El fuego y la destrucción dominan este color de magia. Los dragones son su forma más pura. El maná rojo proviene de las montañas.\nEsta muestra está actualmente en construcción.
JP Red mana burns away its foes. Fire and destruction rule this color of magic. Dragons are its purest embodiment. Red mana comes from the mountains.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.
KR Red mana burns away its foes. Fire and destruction rule this color of magic. Dragons are its purest embodiment. Red mana comes from the mountains.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.
SG Red mana burns away its foes. Fire and destruction rule this color of magic. Dragons are its purest embodiment. Red mana comes from the mountains.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.
HK Red mana burns away its foes. Fire and destruction rule this color of magic. Dragons are its purest embodiment. Red mana comes from the mountains.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.
TW Red mana burns away its foes. Fire and destruction rule this color of magic. Dragons are its purest embodiment. Red mana comes from the mountains.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.
Red mana burns away its foes. Fire and destruction rule this color of magic. Dragons are its purest embodiment. Red mana comes from the mountains.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.
Sphinxes drink from the mystic meres of Serra’s realm, where their keen eyes watch reflections of what is and what is yet to come.
Les sphinx s'abreuvent dans les étangs mystiques du royaume de Serra, où leur regard vif surprend les reflets de ce qui est et de ce qui va venir.
Sphingen trinken aus den mystischen Weihern in Serras Reich, in denen sie mit ihren wachen Augen die Spiegelungen dessen, was war und was noch kommen wird, lesen können.
Le sfingi bevono dai mistici laghi del reame di Serra, dove il loro sguardo acuto osserva il riflesso di ciò che è e di ciò che sarà.
Las esfinges beben de las lagunas místicas del reino de Serra, en donde sus agudos ojos ven reflejos de lo que es y lo que será.
JP Sphinxes drink from the mystic meres of Serra's realm, where their keen eyes watch reflections of what is and what is yet to come.
KR Sphinxes drink from the mystic meres of Serra's realm, where their keen eyes watch reflections of what is and what is yet to come.
SG Sphinxes drink from the mystic meres of Serra's realm, where their keen eyes watch reflections of what is and what is yet to come.
HK Sphinxes drink from the mystic meres of Serra's realm, where their keen eyes watch reflections of what is and what is yet to come.
TW Sphinxes drink from the mystic meres of Serra's realm, where their keen eyes watch reflections of what is and what is yet to come.
Sphinxes drink from the mystic meres of Serra’s realm, where their keen eyes watch reflections of what is and what is yet to come.
They say a single drop of dragon’s blood turns skin to scale and fist to claw.
Une seule goutte suffit à faire pousser des écailles sur la peau, des griffes sur les mains.
Schon ein kleiner Tropfen verwandelt Haut in Schuppen und Faust in Klaue.
Dicono che una sola goccia di sangue di drago trasforma la pelle in scaglie e i pugni in artigli.
Una sola gota cambia la piel por escamas y los puños por garras.
JP They say a single drop of dragon's blood turns skin to scale and fist to claw.
KR They say a single drop of dragon's blood turns skin to scale and fist to claw.
SG They say a single drop of dragon's blood turns skin to scale and fist to claw.
HK They say a single drop of dragon's blood turns skin to scale and fist to claw.
TW They say a single drop of dragon's blood turns skin to scale and fist to claw.
They say a single drop of dragon’s blood turns skin to scale and fist to claw.
When she flies above the good, they consider themselves blessed. When she flies above the wicked, they consider themselves dead.
« Les anges sont peut-être irréels, mais leurs épées sont bien forgées. » —Un barbare profane
Wenn sie über den Guten fliegt, bedeutet das Segen. Wenn sie über den Bösen fliegt, bedeutet das Tod.
Quando vola sopra i retti, si considerano benedetti. Quando vola sopra i malvagi, si considerano morti.
Cuando vuela sobre los buenos, se consideran bendecidos. Cuando vuela sobre los perversos, se consideran muertos.
JP When she flies above the good, they consider themselves blessed. When she flies above the wicked, they consider themselves dead.
KR When she flies above the good, they consider themselves blessed. When she flies above the wicked, they consider themselves dead.
SG When she flies above the good, they consider themselves blessed. When she flies above the wicked, they consider themselves dead.
HK When she flies above the good, they consider themselves blessed. When she flies above the wicked, they consider themselves dead.
TW When she flies above the good, they consider themselves blessed. When she flies above the wicked, they consider themselves dead.
When she flies above the good, they consider themselves blessed. When she flies above the wicked, they consider themselves dead.
White mana lays down the law. It’s about protection, light, armies of soldiers, and flights of angels. White mana comes from the plains.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.

Le mana blanc détermine les lois. Il se spécialise dans la protection, la lumière, les armées de soldats et les escadrilles d'anges. Le mana blanc provient des plaines.\nCette exposition est en cours de construction.

Weißes Mana kümmert sich um Recht und Ordnung. Du brauchst es für Schutz, Licht, Soldaten-Armeen und Engel-Geschwader. Weißes Mana kommt aus den Ebenen.\nAn dieser Ausstellung wird derzeit noch gearbeitet.

Il mana bianco amministra la legge. I suoi punti di forza sono luce e protezione, armate di soldati e schiere di angeli. Il mana bianco proviene dalle pianure.\nQuesta mostra al momento è in costruzione.
El maná blanco dicta la ley. Trata de la protección, la luz, ejércitos de soldados y ángeles. El maná blanco proviene de las llanuras.\nEsta muestra está actualmente en construcción.
JP White mana lays down the law. It's about protection, light, armies of soldiers, and flights of angels. White mana comes from the plains.\nThis exhibit is currently under construction.
